title: Like it
review: I have been using this app for over a year and I like it a lot. I‚Äôm giving it 4 stars only because the coupons could be better and being a member could get you more coupons, but they give you only 3 good coupons for the month and that‚Äôs all. I would like to see better coupons and more of them, especially since you have some very loyal customers! That‚Äôs just me though and only my opinion.

title: Barely working
review:
I do not have a plastic B-R card so having the T-Mobile offer was an opportunity to download the App and create a virtual card since it may be the end of April, but it‚Äôs still too cold for ice cream and the promo value will expire shortly if not transferred to a gift card. I much prefer a virtual card.
This App is not at all intuitive when trying to apply the T-Mobile promo to a new virtual card. I eventually got it to work after several attempts and apologies from the App about the App not being able to add the promo at that time. I did it a few days ago and may have gone through the website since the App was being difficult.
Now I have a second T-Mobile promo I wanted to add to my existing virtual card and that feature is not possible as a reload at this time. I tried creating an additional virtual card and that is also not possible at this time according to the App which says I can do it online or in the store.
If the T-Mobile offer was going to exacerbate an already disfunction App you are only further embarrassing B-R and T-Mobile before the App could accommodate the T-Mobile offer.
I will try the website again but whether I succeed or fail that doesn‚Äôt change my opinion of the App.

title: Terrible App!
review:
I did the whole 9 yards-the app, my info, took forever to even maneuver it‚Ä¶
sent my best friend not one but TWO gift cards-of course, my $ pulled from my bank right away. I know my bf‚Äôs info by heart. Her email has NEVER changed-she NEVER got either card. Have YRIED to get through to someone for a solution but to no avail. I‚Äôm a disabled veteran with hands/fingers that barely work‚Ä¶only stating this because I spent SOOO much time filling out every little thing B-R‚Äôs asked for and got NOTHING for ALL that time & trouble!!  Someone somewhere got paid w/ my $!! 
Waist of my time!
(Salt in the wound-just recently one of our only 2 stores just folded up & went away. Now we have one. Only ONE-and to bring my business to them-it‚Äôs a 40 minute drive 1-way. LOVE the couple that runs it but considering most all of us take the time to download an app to be able to get some kind of a coupon or treat from time to time and ice cream prices have gone up like everything else‚Ä¶just a sad deal. 
Sheryl

title: Timer for coupons?!
review: I love Baskin Robbins but this app is probably the worst restaurant/store app I‚Äôve ever used. It crashed while I was making an account and now my birthday is wrong and there‚Äôs no way to fix it. I went in today to use a coupon offered in the app, only to find there was a timer once activated. It said ‚Äú5:00‚Äù and I assumed that must mean 5 hours, but actually it was 5 minutes! By the time it was my turn it coupon was gone. Fortunately the store has excellent customer service and honored the coupon anyway even though I didn‚Äôt even ask for them to since it was my mistake for ‚Äúactivating‚Äù the coupon too early. This timer for coupons is completely ridiculous and I can‚Äôt see any benefit to the customer or the stores for having such an aggravating feature. I am deleting this app, and encourage others to avoid this app altogether.

title: Was Nice When It Worked
review:
I‚Äôve had this app for a while and have used it to order cakes for family events a few times. It was great, because I could put the information in and it just worked, and that‚Äôs all I wanted. 

But since the latest app update, I can‚Äôt check out. I enter all my credit card information (which, by the way, why can‚Äôt a major company like this use Apple Pay so that I don‚Äôt have to manually type my credit card?! It is 2021!) and all my contact information, and the ‚Äúcomplete order‚Äù button at the bottom just doesn‚Äôt do anything. No errors, I‚Äôm not missing any fields - it‚Äôs just like the button isn‚Äôt there at all. 

Yikes. If your app is literally preventing people from buying your products, it may be time for a do-over.

title: Crashed when trying to use coupon.
review: I love Baskin Robbins but this app is horrible. Probably the worst food app I‚Äôve ever used. Really counterintuitive. I tried to order a cake through it and even though the cake was $45 and it was the only thing in the cart, it said the grand total was $180?!! So I call the store to order. When I go to pick it up, I try to redeem the $5 off coupon I have and right when I click the coupon it says ‚Äúunhandled exception occurred‚Äù and then the reward disappeared. The lousy thing is the store wouldn‚Äôt even honor the discount after I told them about the issue. I mean I know they aren‚Äôt the ones responsible for the app but it‚Äôs just bad business all around. Nice trick on pretending I‚Äôll get a discount when I won‚Äôt.

title: Worthless app
review: I have been unsuccessful In trying to order a cake for my son‚Äôs birthday in a few days.  I get all the way through picking out the design, cake variety, ice cream flavor and message, but when I actually go try to checkout, I get an error message‚Äî‚ÄúError: Looks like we‚Äôre frozen.‚Äù  It‚Äôs very annoying.  I‚Äôve tried logging out then logging back in, restarting my phone, uninstalling and reinstalling the app, but I get the same result every single time.  In going back through all the app reviews here, it seems like the same problems were there from years ago and nothing was fixed.  I guess Baskin & Robbins just doesn‚Äôt care that they have a craptastic app.

title: Not worth it
review:
I don‚Äôt even know where to start. I‚Äôve tried to order a few different cakes through this app. I ended up having to go in to the store to do it because the apps wouldn‚Äôt accept payment. The app was slow and awkward for ordering. 

Also, I get notifications that there are new coupons on the app. Coupons. Their word. Not mine. I have never gotten a coupon nor have I gotten a deal under their deals. I exclusively get promotions. Try one of this drink or this new flavor or we have cakes for graduation. Those are not coupons. Those are not deals. 

DQ has a great app. Their ice cream may not be as good as BR but the app is worth having. It‚Äôs time to for me to delete the BR app.

title: Love you guys, buuuut.....
review:
Baskin Robbins is an amazing company to me and I love it always. What would make me a much better, and happier, is if their digital options to purchase didn‚Äôt only come from Door Dash. I‚Äôve been hoping, and waiting patiently for the app to update properly to make it so I can order online ice cream and cakes but I haven‚Äôt been lucky. While I can buy some flavors in Fred Meyer, I want to support this franchise directly because my favorite flavor is actually ‚ÄúDaiquiri Ice‚Äù & ‚ÄúChocolate Chip Cookie Dough‚Äù. 
I also tried ordering on the website thinking ‚Äúthere‚Äôs no way this doesn‚Äôt work‚Äù and I was wrong. Please fix both of them so that we can all enjoy what we grew up on. I would love to see you guys thrive into the future.

title: App and websites both don‚Äôt work!
review: After wasting 20+mins on its website and its app (cuz the website didn‚Äôt work so I tried to download its app as well), the checkout process still couldn‚Äôt complete but showing me the same error message which I do not know what went wrong. After four attempts I‚Äôm totally fed up and will order with some other shop after I leave this review. In addition, they are asking way too much personal info for ordering a cake, you are required to leave your address and phone number and email no matter what (sign in as guest or sign up or pick up only).

title: Inability to Merge Gift Cards via App
review: Surely a business like this can manage to create the option for its app users to merge the gift cards they receive. I find it a bit ridiculous having to e-mail customer service to complete an otherwise simple task. It‚Äôs also a hassle to use the separate gift cards off the mobile app in store...slows down the progression of the line and makes for uncomfortable exchanges. Otherwise, a decent app. New flavors and promotions are always up to date and the notifications are sound.

title: Baskin Robbins app: not as advertised; total disappointment
review: When a business offers a perk BASED on the condition that you get their app, my experience is that most deliver on their promises. Not this one. After over a week of it not working, I went to my local BR & showed them & asked them to help. The bottom line is that they had no solution & didn‚Äôt seem to care. As I was about to order my sundae (anyway), I felt a sense of having been duped. Instead, I said I had to go & give this app 0 stars- which I WISH was an option. If you want the app to facilitate buying more Baskin Robbins products, get it. If you want it for the perks or promises, good luck.

title: App needs to be fixed
review: This app used to be great when it worked. And being that there must be some sort of partnership with the app developers who do the Dunkin‚Äô app I put the blame on them for all the issues logging in to the apps. Until they can resolve this error communicating with server issues I will not be going to either Baskin Robbins or Dunkin if I can‚Äôt access the coupons and gift card balances I have with them.

title: Pointless.
review: What is the point of this app even existing if you can‚Äôt actually mobile order a cone, a milkshake or a sundae on it? You can only buy cakes and quarts of ice cream. Then you get in the drive-thru and have to wait too long to put in your order, even though there‚Äôs only one other car in line. Then you tell them what you want and you have to repeat it because they didn‚Äôt hear you say it the first time. üôÑü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Epic FAIL. Plus the app isn‚Äôt very intuitive or user friendly, it‚Äôs a bit stiff. Whoever designed this needs to be fired from the UI/UX team ASAP!!!!!!! üëèüèªüëèüèªüòÇ

title: This app is so frustrating!
review: I wanted to buy a birthday cake for my father, but the app won‚Äôt let me complete the checkout. It keeps freezing, and I‚Äôve tried repeatedly to get it to work only to be met with the ‚ÄúSorry looks like we‚Äôre frozen!‚Äù notification. There‚Äôs way too many loading errors on the app in general. The layout for the app is just clunky, there‚Äôs no search bar so you have to scroll through all their cakes in order to find the one you‚Äôre looking for. I just wanted to buy a birthday cake but man....this app makes it impossible

title: Gift cards
review: I could do everything fine on the app but I got a bunch of T-Mobile Tuesdays offers which are only $2 each, and there‚Äôs no way to combine the offers. Also, it truly bugs me that I can‚Äôt use them online and I couldn‚Äôt sign into my account online to order a cake for my sisters birthday. I had to get myself to the store, choose one of the few cakes they had, and then use the gift cards one at a time. The poor people behind me had to wait about 15 minutes, and I had to give my phone to the cashier many separate times. It was embarrassing and utterly unacceptable.

title: App Crashes Every 5 Minutes
review: This app is terrible. It won‚Äôt let me log in at all. I‚Äôve already tried deleting and re-downloading the app and changing my password. And Baskin-Robbins prompted me to log into their website and I go to the website and it says I can only log in on the app... which the app won‚Äôt allow me to do. The coupon timer is ridiculous and the stupidest thing I‚Äôve ever experienced. Also some Baskin Robbins locations DO NOT HONOR THE COUPONS! When the app was somewhat working, every time I clicked it, it had logged me out again. Guys there‚Äôs a reason this app has 2 stars...

title: Cheated with the coupon
review: I decided to splurge on a budget to treat my daughter to ice cream since I had a coupon. We got 2 double scoops on 1-waffle cone & other in a waffle bowl). Using the coupon under deals in the app (buy one cone, get one 50% off). I was expecting to get 50% off one cone making the $5.29/2= $2.65 off to pay less.  The coupon only took off $1.78 (not sure where that amount came fromüò†). The deals on the 31st is no longer; therefore, I expect the coupon be more of a deal.  In this pandemic people can use more of a discount.  I felt cheated.

title: ?? latest update has caused app to crash
review: i used to be able to open app and be automatically logged in & my coupons pulled up, but since the update, i open app and it tells me to log in, which i do through FB, but instead of logging me in, it takes me to a screen that says sign up and when i check that i'm 13 or over, it says account already exists...well duuuuh, log me in though FB then, like i always have. Another thing is the B'day club. why ask for my b'day if its going to change the date by 2 or 3 days? Someone PLEASE GET IT TOGETHER. What is yalls issue?

title: Useless
review: This app is completely USELESS!!! You can‚Äôt really order anything! I wanted to order a cappuccino blast and a banana split, but guess what?  You can‚Äôt order it!! What‚Äôs the point of having an app if you can only order pre-packed ice cream and brownies.  So.... let me get this straight, this app lets you order things you can go to the store and pick up, but stuff that takes time to make you still have to go in order and wait?  What‚Äôs the point then?  Whoever created this app must have been a genius!! Congrats to them!

title: A request
review: So I‚Äôm writing this review hoping that the app could have a merge balance option when you have multiple cards. I had a few cards with $2 in them each and merging them would make paying easier rather than opening each one separately.

title: Easy to use and configure
review:
I love Baskin Robins. I use my TMobile gift cards all the time when I get them. There‚Äôs only one option I would add. Combine gift cards instead of having to switch through a bunch of gift cards. It would help a lot. 

The app works really well for me. No problems and everything is easy to access.

title: Worst App I‚Äôve used to date
review: This app is just disrespectful. I feel like BR hired a bunch of first year programming students to make this app. Nothing works. I‚Äôm always looking at a ‚Äúloading‚Äù screen. App crashes all the time. It‚Äôs not worth the hassle to do anything on this card. It makes me not want to visit BR. I don‚Äôt understand how because the Dunkin Donuts app is phenomenal. If I didn‚Äôt know it before, today I am convinced Baskin Robbins is a failing company with no value over other ice cream shops. What a joke. Go to a local place instead. I‚Äôll bet their ‚Äúreward system‚Äù is better anyways

title: Sorry to say :/
review: I downloaded this app around Father‚Äôs Day and tried to purchase a gift card for my dad. I was charged 5 times for one gift card cuz the app said there was an error message several times I tried to complete the order. Then after several attempts of reaching out to customer service I still have yet to get the money that was over charged back. :/ Bummed I don‚Äôt have something better to say about this app, but very disappointed with my experience.

title: Needs improvement
review: I love going to Basking Robbins but i hate this app. I have gift cards on the app but every time i go in store to try and use them they struggle and they apologize and tell me I can‚Äôt use it. Not only that but i also can‚Äôt merge them so when i was able to use them and it was once i had to individually scan each gift card. This app is such a let down for a growing ice cream shop. If you‚Äôre going to give me the option to pay from on my phone you need to make sure it works.

title: Worst app I have ever used
review:
Not only does this app frustrate you just trying to make an account to log in, which by the way you can‚Äôt, you are forced to use Facebook to log in... but even once you are in and want to pay, it asks you for a log in again, and there is no way around this one. It‚Äôs just a constant loop of asking for a log in name and password.

USELESS APP by a large company like Baskin Robbins. If I could give negative star ratings, this app would deserve it.

BTW, using the app on an iPhone 8 with iOS 11.1

title: FREE ICE CREAM? WAIT 24 HOURS
review: I thought I was gonna get his app while I was in the store and get a free cone, from what it said on the door that was how in worked. Nope. You have to wait 30 hours for the coupon to deliver. The app is also poorly organized, it looks like a collage. Terrible. Half the coupons there also have a catch, such as $3 off and in tiny words that u can barely read says ‚Äúminimum $15 purchase‚Äù. I‚Äôm very dissatisfied and hope they fix their app soon. Because I‚Äôm deleting it. What a waste of space!!

title: Horrible...hasn‚Äôt worked in months
review:
Im not sure what happened to the app but it was working perfectly fine. All of a sudden it wont accept my email or password. When I reset it, it still doesn‚Äôt work!! I sign up all over again and the same thing happens with a different email. 
When I go online to log in, it works like the app used to! Can someone please fix this or add coupons to the website? Thanks.

title: Don‚Äôt work
review: I can‚Äôt believe this app has 4 stars when it does work at all. I was able to register but when I tried to order something it takes us straight to find a store after you select one it does NOTHING! it doesn‚Äôt even have a next button so you are not able to move forward. I try to make an order online as well and it has the same issue. Very frustrating!

title: Merge balance needed!
review: 4 stars, overall great except it could be better if they added the merge card balance option. It‚Äôs easier when paying and convenient when you are not using more than one card.

title: Got me in trouble!
review: My boyfriend wanted ice cream from Baskin Robins. I decided to download this app-which surprisingly downloaded pretty fast. I went to look up the ice cream flavors and topping flavors and the stupid app only listed cakes, novelties, pints, it even listed candles-really candles but not the flavors of ice cream. Seriously, the ice cream flavors were not listed. My boyfriends patience wore thin and he left the room frustrated with me! This is a ‚ÄúThanks for nothing‚Äù app. Don‚Äôt waste your time downloading it!

title: App is horrible
review: Almost every time I use this app, something doesn‚Äôt work. It‚Äôs usually the login. Today it did not accept my password and when I used the app to change it, the recovery email took me outside the app. For the fun of it, I tried to set my not-working password as my new password but it was not accepted because it was already used by me. Then, after actually creating a new password, the app did not recognize it either.

title: Needs more improvement
review: I love Baskin-Robbins but their sometimes don‚Äôt work in registers especially gift cards so k have many gift cards giving to me since they know my kids love their ice cream. I wish I can combine the gift cards just like the one from Dunkin‚Äô Donuts. I wish u guys make this option available. Other than that it‚Äôs updates need more work like able to order online pickup or who knows.

title: Avoid at all costs
review: So I decided to try the app for my kids. Wanted to treat them. The app make it difficult to register. Then saw the deals they had, was excited, but when I went to the store, was told that it was invalid even though I just registered. Even tried to order just a single scoop and the app apparently does NOT allow that at all. So avoid this app unless u want to waste your time.

title: Birthdate
review: I just downloaded this app... and i put my birthday as July 27... and when i look at the date a few minutes later... it says 7/25 or 7/26... i dont want those dates i want 7/27... fix please and add a birthdate editing system... i think my only problem right about now is the birthdate... so i don‚Äôt know about the rest of the app

title: Horrible
review: As a T-Mobile customer, I have been unable to redeem the codes given to us. Using ‚Äúforgot my password‚Äù just sends a new password for their birthday club but doesn‚Äôt help you sign in. As everyone else said, Facebook login probably works but if you can‚Äôt get your app working properly I can‚Äôt imagine you‚Äôd be using my Facebook information responsibly either. I hope T-Mobile drops BR and just gives DD codes until you fix this.

title: Disruptive bloatware. Not a functional app.
review: Don't let them fool you. This is only really an app for custom ordering cakes. There are no coupons here for customers who like ice cream and sundaes. Never any new coupons and sends disruptive push notifications for the same three tired promos. I just don't want a mangonada. I've had the app for over a year, so I think it's fair to say I gave it a good chance!! Just bloats my phone.

title: Cannot Log In
review: I signed up for this app right before National Ice Cream Day.  I could log in fine and had coupons which included a free single scoop which would expire on July 31.  When I went to use it I could not log into my account.  I reset my password but still could not log in.  It is now a few weeks later and still says error on their end.  So lost my free ice cream.  Well, at least the app did not cost anything hence the 1 star.

title: Useless app
review: Not able reload app with gift card for more than two months. Website doesn‚Äôt have option to redeem gift card. BR is totally crap app and experience. Better to have other ice creams than these. They never forget to spam you even if you unsubscribe. Why there is no zero or negative rating here. Online order never goes through. I will not trust BR with my card details if they have such a crappy tech support.

title: Directions not clear
review: I just downloaded with intentions to purchase items for a group. After twenty minutes of futzing around with it, I still cannot figure out how to add items to my shopping cart. This app is laid out differently than others as I don‚Äôt see radio buttons or any kind of ‚Äúadd here‚Äù to add items to my bag. Unless this is a recent bug- someone needs to add what to do to FAQ or somewhere. Thanks. Loyal customer and ex exployee over 30yrs algo.

title: Maybe at points for each purchase
review: It would be nice to have a point system going on. For each dollar you spend you can gain points towards a feee scoop etc

title: Login?
review:
Why in the world would I need an app, if it doesn‚Äôt even have fingerprint/face ID login? I thought that‚Äôs the main reason to have an app? So you can log in easily? If it doesn‚Äôt do that, why do I need an app? I could just log in with the browser...
I‚Äôm not really using the app, except to use a coupon occasionally, but that log in thing really bugs me. It‚Äôs 2019!

title: Needs A Merge Balance Option
review: So Baskin Robbins and Dunkin‚Äô Donuts are pretty much the same company. So how come on the DD app you can merge all of your card balances but you can‚Äôt do that on the BR app ? It‚Äôs such a pain to go to the store and swipe through several cards to pay and start a line of people behind me as the cashier is patiently trying to scan them all. Please fix this and make it just like the DD app and let us finally merge our card balances.

title: Could be a lot better
review: One annoying thing is you cannot merge balances from different cards stored in the app into one card. I loaded several $2 cards I received into the app and each one had to be scanned separately at checkout, not the end of the world but it makes an otherwise quick transaction take longer than it should.

title: Great Cakes!
review: I think up occasions to buy a BR cake! They always are fresh and beautiful. The Kanawha City store does an excellent job. The designs are perfect and I‚Äôve never had an order that was wrong in any way.

title: Great Service!
review: Always greeted with a smile! They go out of their way even when they probably don‚Äôt want to so they provide great customer service.  Worth a ‚Äúcheat‚Äù day!

title: Doesn‚Äôt Work
review: This is one of the worst food apps I have ever used. It continuously crashes to the point where I can‚Äôt even sign in. It also signs me out every time I close the app but gives me difficulty with signing in too. Now thanks to this terrible app, I can‚Äôt even access the gift cards I have linked to this account. Totally frustrated.

title: Worst Restaurant App Ever
review: I‚Äôve never used an app for a store/ restaurant that is so bad. There has to be bots rating this 5 stars because it‚Äôs a 2 at best. It‚Äôs so difficult to order on and a very strange set up. The designer needs to be fired. Also, it‚Äôs very glitchy and doesn‚Äôt include the whole menu when you want to order takeout. You can‚Äôt even order a cone or anything like that. Quite a strange app.

title: Even more useless after updating
review:
Update 7/10: After this newest update, this app is worse even more!! No way to log in except using facebook even though I‚Äôve always have an account!!! So now I can‚Äôt add my gift cards anymore!!!

It has a bunch of things but they are mostly useless and takes forever to load anything! And THEY NEED TO HAVE A FEATURE TO COMBINE ALL THE GIFT CARDS INTO ONE AKA TRANSFER MONEY FROM ONE GIFT CARD TO ANOTHER! Even dunkin donuts has that feature!!!

title: The app is to clunky
review:
You can‚Äôt or barely can scroll down when loading a gift card. Sometimes tapping on things won‚Äôt apply it. I lost a gift card because I never made an account, once I did the gift card was still missing.

You can‚Äôt even combined the gift cards so you waste time and space scrolling for cards.

A lot of things can be removed to make the app more usable and appealing.

title: Horrible app
review:
I was at the register trying to check out when the app decided to not let me use it because I had an outdated version. It prompted me to click ok to upgrade which I did and nothing happened. This took some time to upgrade. Then my free scoop
Of ice cream which you get when you download the app showed up in stores as not valid. This app is a joke, kind of like the stores. Get it together and hire a new IT team.

title: these technical issues need to be thawed through !!
review: I have been trying to order birthday ice cream cake for the past three days via both web and app, but both app/web have been freezing, and cannot place an order. called a local store but no one is picking up the phone üò≠ these technical issues need to be thawed through!!

title: Absolute trash.
review: It continues to change when my birthday is and honestly that was the only reason I even got the app in the first place. It‚Äôs saying my birthday was a few days ago when it isn‚Äôt until later this week. I know it‚Äôs only a few days but I wanted to fix it and all it does is make it worse. It crashes and takes forever to load. Not worth it

title: Needs major updating
review: Cant merge cards together I have about 50 in there right now. Email customer service which takes 2-3 days for a reply saying they are able to merge cards so emailed back all the card numbers, took another 2-3 days for a reply saying they could only merge 10 cards........ PLEASE make it available on the app to merge cards so it‚Äôs easier for BR workers and for others with the app.

title: Worst app
review: Worse app ever, that‚Äôs a joke that this app won‚Äôt let you merge balance into one card I‚Äôm a T-Mobile Tuesday customer and I get them when they have this option but it‚Äôs ridiculous that I have to keep several gift cards in this app. It looks that Baskin-Robbins doesn‚Äôt care about this issue since I‚Äôm not the only one complaining about it and they still haven‚Äôt fix it.

title: Worthless App
review: This app is worthless and cannot be used to order on an IPhone.  When it is asking for an expiration date for the credit card, it does not automatically input a ‚Äú/‚Äú between the month and year.  Only problem is there is no ‚Äú/‚Äú on the keyboard.  Avoid this useless product at all cost....

title: promotion
review: I was really interested in the stranger things promotion sweepstakes but it seems like everyone has the same issues. The password doesn‚Äôt work after you‚Äôve already downloaded the app and made an account. it‚Äôs all a scam to make you download their stupid app. maybe i would‚Äôve kept it with the rest of my barely used apps in a folder but y‚Äôall like to lie so here we are.

title: Needs More items
review: I downloaded this app hoping to be able to order my drinks and was unsuccessful due to them not offering Baskin Robbins shakes, cappuccino blast etc. Also I was going to order my daughter cake but it doesn‚Äôt give you the option to change the color icing. So I guess now I have no choice but to go into the store.

title: App logs you out every time!
review: It‚Äôs so frustrating when you have to sign into an app every single time you use it. I don‚Äôt remember this being a problem before the last few weeks. Now every time I close the app, it logs me out. It doesn‚Äôt even give an option to stay logged in or ‚Äúremember me‚Äù or even allow for Touch ID/Facial ID. This app is seriously disappointing!

title: Barely Works????
review: The app is barely functional, it lets you add gift cards but doesn‚Äôt let you merge the balances if you have more than one. And it doesn‚Äôt even let you add money onto your gift card! I believe it‚Äôs time for an update that gives the ability to do both. Every other apps like this one will let you add money and merge balances so I don‚Äôt know why your app doesn‚Äôt.

title: Login Issues
review: You need to update the app so you can login in with Facebook. I have been having issues for a while. Even deleted the app because I couldn‚Äôt login with Facebook. Update please.

title: Need update
review: The app is just okay but the thing that you really need to update it in it is to allow us to merge the balances of different gift cards in one card

title: Okay

title: Horrible app of you want to sell product

title: Needs improvement
review:
App isn‚Äôt great. It shouldn‚Äôt be that difficult for a company of this size to have a somewhat-functional app.

App desperately needs to not log me out of my account every 48 hours or so, needs to reliably reflect gift card balances, and needs to be able to merge gift card balances.

Please fix this app.

title: Unused Coupons

What‚Äôs the point of erasing an unused coupon? If it is not scanned allow customers to at least use it rather than delete it!! Very unfortunate, decided to just go home.

title: MERGE GIFT CARDS IN APP, please!
review:
Why can't you update app so we can MERGE gift cards? Dunkin Donuts did that a few months ago and it's working out great. Please consider merging soon!
Also, I tried using one of my several gift cards in the app and the store couldn't access it. I had to wind up paying cash. Why??

title: Changing the deals
review: Love the App, but my opinion is the deals should be changed a bit more frequently.

title: App refresh and functionality need work
review: I always have trouble with the app loading when I am looking for the latest deals. Sometimes I will have full reception, but it still won‚Äôt load. It makes it difficult to access the app when I need to.

title: Update local shops

title: Useless
review: This app is garbage! It worked for awhile and still wasn‚Äôt working as it should, but when I tried logging in yesterday it completely stopped. I tried logging in and can‚Äôt. I tried changing the password and still was unable to log in. I‚Äôm glad that I didn‚Äôt have a balance left on this worthless garbage.

title: Can‚Äôt merge gift cards
review: I have the Dunkin Doughnuts app, and it allows for card merging and adding to Apple Wallet, I don‚Äôt understand why the Baskin-Robbins app doesn‚Äôt. They are the same company! I‚Äôm having a hard time understanding who at Baskin-Robbins thinks the merging of gift cards and the ability to add gift cards to Apple Wallet is a bad idea. As a consumer, those things would elevate my shopping experience.

title: Like it but not to much

title: Unable to view gift cards when updating email address or login

I had to update it back to my old email address to be able to see and use those gift cards again.

title: Double dipping!
review: This is the worst app ever. I won a $20 gift card and tried to put the balance on this App. When I tried to use it, the clerk said it‚Äôs showing the card as invalid and wouldn‚Äôt honor the balance on the app. Not only did my friend pay for a worthless $20 gift card, I had to shell out the full balance to pay for my purchase. Double dipping, not cool Baskin Robbins!

title: Fix Your Online Ordering
review: Can't even access my shopping cart on your app OR in your site. Everytime I try all I get is "Error, looks like we're frozen." Your ability to service us online, whether through your app or website, is nothing short of frustrating.

review:
First time I tried the app, I couldn‚Äôt get the deal for an ice cream cake on my phone. No service in restaurant to show them the
 deal. I tried again for another time months later at a different store, same exact thing happened again!!! What good is the app? All my other apps seems to work fine, no problem. üëéüèºüëéüèº

title: App Is Useless

Every time I open it, it asks for the email and password to login - what‚Äôs the point of having an app?  Also, when I click on ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù it just goes back to the main screen, so obviously they don‚Äôt want feedback or questions.

title: All good

title: Needs help
review: This app is not user friendly in the least. It crashes often, you have to sign into it every single time, it doesn‚Äôt even give an option to save your user name. I love having a new Baskin Robbins in my neighborhood but this app leaves a lot to be desired.

title: It gets the job done

title: Ability to merge gift card balances

Add Apple Wallet support with geolocation to offer it in the lock screen, please, and then I will consider going more often to a BR.

title: Need to combine gift cards
review: Baskin-Robbins, we really need a feature that allows us to combine all our gift cards like Dunkin‚Äô Donuts or Starbucks app. Also why do I have to keep logging in when I open app after some days

title: Please Merge
